languages.text: {n}Скорчив страдальческую мину, Данрок склоняет голову.{/n} "Как будет угодно Вашей Светлости. Но когда эта особа заложит ваш корабль, я скажу, что предупреждал".
{n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."
languages.original_text: {n}Скорчив страдальческую мину, Данрок склоняет голову.{/n} "Как будет угодно Вашей Светлости. Но когда эта особа заложит ваш корабль, я скажу, что предупреждал".

traits.locale_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."
{n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."
{n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."
{n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

languages.text: {n}丹罗克带着明显痛苦的表情，低下了头。{/n}“如您所愿，大人。但若是哪天，那个女人把您的船转手卖了出去，别忘了我曾警告过您。”
languages.original_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

traits.locale_text: {n}丹罗克带着明显痛苦的表情，低下了头。{/n}“如您所愿，大人。但若是哪天，那个女人把您的船转手卖了出去，别忘了我曾警告过您。”

languages.text: {n}苦悶に満ちた空気の仲、ダンロックは頭を下げる{/n}「仰せのままに、陛下。ですが、くれぐれもあの女に船を売り払われませぬよう。警告はしましたぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

traits.locale_text: {n}苦悶に満ちた空気の仲、ダンロックは頭を下げる{/n}「仰せのままに、陛下。ですが、くれぐれもあの女に船を売り払われませぬよう。警告はしましたぞ」

languages.text: {n}Con aire angustiado, Danrok agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Como ordene, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Pero cuando acabe empeñando la nave en pleno vuelo, no diga que no se lo advertí».
languages.original_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Con aire angustiado, Danrok agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Como ordene, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Pero cuando acabe empeñando la nave en pleno vuelo, no diga que no se lo advertí».

languages.text: {n}La mine particulièrement inquiète, Danrok baisse la tête.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. Mais le jour où cette femme vendra votre vaisseau dans votre dos, je ne manquerai pas de vous dire que je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}. »
languages.original_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mine particulièrement inquiète, Danrok baisse la tête.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie. Mais le jour où cette femme vendra votre vaisseau dans votre dos, je ne manquerai pas de vous dire que je vous avais {mf|prévenu|prévenue}. »

languages.text: {n}Schmerzvoll senkt Danrok den Kopf.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Aber wenn sich diese Frau auch noch Euer Schiff krallt, dann sagt nicht, dass ich Euch nicht gewarnt hätte."
languages.original_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Schmerzvoll senkt Danrok den Kopf.{/n} "Wie Ihr wünscht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Aber wenn sich diese Frau auch noch Euer Schiff krallt, dann sagt nicht, dass ich Euch nicht gewarnt hätte."

languages.text: {n}Fazlasıyla kederli görünen Danrok, başını eğiyor.{/n} "Nasıl dilerseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak geminiz siz içindeyken o kadın tarafından satılırsa sizi uyarmadığımı söylemeyin."
languages.original_text: {n}With an air of pure anguish, Danrok bows his head.{/n} "As you wish, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But when that woman sells your ship out from under you, I will say I warned you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Fazlasıyla kederli görünen Danrok, başını eğiyor.{/n} "Nasıl dilerseniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Ancak geminiz siz içindeyken o kadın tarafından satılırsa sizi uyarmadığımı söylemeyin."
